Čeština: Realističtější počet obyvatel budov (na základě velikosti budovy) a potřeby veřejných služeb.
Old calculations used by versions 1.x of this mod and Whitefang Greytail's original Realistic Population and Consumption mod.
Evropské středně vysoké a zeď na zeď apartmány (střední hustota; moderní budovy).
Evropské středně vysoké a zeď na zeď apartmány (vysoká hustota; starší budovy).
General commercial retail density typical of USA.
General commercial retail density typical of UK.
Velkoobchody s nepotravinářským zbožím a maloobchodní sklady.
Sklady pro místní distribuci - hodně skladování a nízká hustota pracovních míst.
Sklady pro vnitrostátní distribuci - hodně skladování a velmi nízká hustota pracovních míst.
Corporate, professional services, and public sector offices.
Financial offices; higher density than typical corporate offices
Call centers and other tightly-packed offices
Průvodce Minnesotského ministerstva školství - nejnižší hustota
Průvodce Minnesotského ministerstva školství - střední hustota
Průvodce Minnesotského ministerstva školství - nejvyšší hustota
Standard planning densities for the UK.
Budovy se vstupními halami a(nebo) vyvýšenými prvními patry.
Obchodní, kancelářské, vzdělávací a průmyslové budovy s vyšší výškou podlaží.
Has custom override and/or non-default calculation pack
Has non-default calculation pack and/or custom population multiplier
Adds (or updates) a custom setting for the selected building
Removes the custom setting from the selected building
CHYBA: hodnota musí být větší než nula
Floor calculation selection is not available when using legacy calculations
The number of floors (stories) for this building calculated using the above settings.
The total floor area for this building calculated using the above settings.
The total population (households or workplaces) for this building calculated using the above settings.
The maximum number of simultaneous customers supported by this building.
This building's maximum rate of production.
The typical floor-to-floor height, in meters, of each story in this building (the first floor has additional options below).
The minimum building height required for a section of the building to count as having at least one story.
The first floor height will be extended upwards by this many meters (on top of the typical floor height above) before additional floors are added above.
If this is set, the first floor of the building is treated as empty space (e.g. a lobby or foyer area) with no households or workers.
This percentage of each floor area will be treated as empty area and will not be included when calculating households or worker counts.
Pevně stanovená plocha, která se odečte od každého podlaží před výpočtem domácností nebo pracovníků (považuje se za prázdnou plochu).
If this is set, a fixed figure for household or worker counts will be used, regardless of building size (e.g. one household per building).
Fixed number of households or workers per building.
The area (in square meters) required for each household or worker (after empty area has been deducted).

If this is not set, then household or worker counts will be calculated for each individual floor in the building. If this is set, only the building total will be used to calculate household or worker counts.
Výpočet populace je potlačen ručním nastavením
Ploppable RICO Revisited kontroluje údaje o této budově.
The number and level of workplaces available at this school calculated using the above settings
The school's construction cost and weekly maintenance cost calculated using the above settings
Klávesová zkratka pro obrazovku nastavení budovy
Povolit realistické vlastnosti školy (práce, náklady) - vyžaduje restart
The base crime accumulation for the city will be multiplied by this amount
Display figures in US Customary units (instead of metric)
Povolit všechny typy zónování od začátku hry

The basis for calculating the number of customers this building can handle at once. The old method was to use the size of the building's lot, and the new method is to use the number of workplaces in the building.
The calculated customer capacity will be multiplied by this amount
The amount of goods sold by this building per customer will be multiplied by this amount; reduced rates will mean fewer goods are required, but tax revenue will also be reduced
Sets the maximum building inventory level that will trigger the ordering of more goods (does not affect buildings with calculated inventory order trigger levels that are already lower than this cap).
The basis for calculating the production rate of this building. The old method was to use the size of the building's lot, and the new method is to use the number of workplaces in the building.
The amount of goods produced by this building will be muliplied by this amount
Další informace naleznete na stránce módu na Steam Workshopu.
Tento uložený soubor nebyl uložen s Realistic Population 2.
Please be aware that applying different population calculations to an existing city can temporarily disrupt city balance.

Note that in any case, existing residential buildings will retain their existing capacities and households and will NOT be affected, and workers with existing jobs will NOT be immediately displaced from those jobs, so there will be no immediate impact on your city's population.
Choose new calculations to immediately apply the mod's standard calculations.
Choose vanilla calculations to continue using the game's default calculations.  You can change to the mod's calculations later.

Choose legacy calculations to use the calculations used by earlier versions of this mod (the Realistic Population and Consumption mod and Realistic Population Revisited version 1).  Only choose this if your savefile used one of these earlier versions.
This means that Realistic Population 2 is not able to operate properly and has shut down.
column3: Warning message letting the user know that the mod can't work.

Čeština: Realistic Population 2 nedokázal dokončit požadované záplaty Harmony.
column3: Warning message that a patching problem was detected, and the mod can't operate.
Header for list of possible causes of Harmony errors.

Čeština: Vyžadován mód Harmony 2, který není nainstalován
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - Harmony not installed.

Čeština: Starý a (nebo) rozbitý mód brání správnému fungování Harmony 2
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - a broken mod (not this one) can cause things to stop working.

Čeština: Jiný mód se možná pokouší použít konfliktní Harmony záplatu
column3: Possible cause of Harmony error - two mods trying to patch the same thing at once.
Part of the mod conflict warning notification - header for the list of conflicting mods.

Čeština: Realistic Population 2 zjistil konflikt s alespoň jedním dalším modem.
column3: Warning message that a mod conflict was detected.

Čeština: Tyto mody musí být odstraněny před tím, než bude možné pracovat se Realistic Population 2.
Renaming from 'Realistic Population Revisited' to 'Realistic Population 2' to reflect the extent of the changes

MAJOR NEW FEATURE: new building population calculations based on actual building shapes and sizes with realistically calculated floorspace, with the option to choose between the new or old ('legacy') calculations
MAJOR NEW FEATURE: separate calculation presets for building floorspace and population, along with optional manual overrides for either or both
MAJOR NEW FEATURE: volitelné předvolby konfigurace pro každý typ služeb budovy
MAJOR NEW FEATURE: optional realistic student capacity calculations for elementary and high schools, with configurable multiplier for when realistically-sized school buildings aren't available
MAJOR NEW FEATURE: přizpůsobitelná míra trestné činnosti
Upgradovat na Harmony 2 (je vyžadován modul Harmony 2)
Vylepšené oznamování konfliktů a chyb módu
Významná revize, vyčištění a restrukturalizace kódu módu
Add option to use US customary measures (feet and square feet) in place of metric measurements
Plazas & Promenades typy budov zeď na zeď mají nyní samostatné nastavení
Přidat možnost odemknout všechny typy zónování od začátku hry
Update commercial goods sales multiplier code
